name: Millennium Pelvic Bench
descr:
Chiroform has developed a first class serie of treatment- and examination equipment in co-operation with doctors, designer teams, engineers and the industry. The Chiroform Millennium equipment wears the global patent and trademark, and focus on both the patient and practitioner. New perspectives and options will open up with the Chiroform Millennium equipment.

The Chiroform Millennium Pelvic Bench has stepless height adjusting chrome legs for individual working position. The unique anatomical shape and oval design makes both the examination and treatment excellent, and at the same time the patient is safe and secured. The dual shape makes the bench adaptable for any practitioner room and provides fast and easy access to side posture treatment, no matter which side is in your favour. Dual oval face holes for optimum positioning. The Chiroform Millennium Pelvic Bench extend and improve your working life as professional practitioner.

Available in other fabrics and colours by request.

5 years of warranty on the frame. Upholstery 1 year of warranty.

Accessories: Step Pillow or Anatomical Head Pillow.
